common.changes_made_msg: Changes made. Click the save button to apply
common.general_error_title: Sorry, looks like something went wrong
common.general_error_paragraph: We aren't able to get the requested information, please try again later. If the error persists, please contact Altinn support.
common.delete_pos_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the power of attorney?
common.refresh_cookie_alert: The chosen actor has been changed in another tab. To synchronize with the change, this page will now reload.
common.technical_error: Sorry, a technical error has occurred. Please contact Altinn user service if the problem persists.
common.unauthorized_for_party: You cannot delegate services for the selected actor. If you meant to delegate on behalf of someone else, please go to the profile and select this actor from the list of delegators.

beta_banner.info: This is a beta version of the new access management pages in Altinn.
beta_banner.link: Click here to go back to today's Altinn.

sidebar.consent: Consent and power of attorney agreements

error_page.not_found_site_header: Oops! The page you're trying to find is unknown to us.
error_page.not_found_site_upper_text: We do not know where you really intended to go, but perhaps you can find what you are looking for on some of these pages:
error_page.not_found_site_lower_text: If this was not helpful you are free to contact Altinn support on telephone 75 00 60 00
error_page.find_and_submit_scheme: Find and submit a new form
error_page.not_found_site_description: Many come to Altinn to do one of these things:
error_page.see_messages: See messages or tasks in the inbox
error_page.start_or_run_business: Read about rights and obligations for entrepreneurs
error_page.unknown_error_header: Oops! An error seems to have occurred
error_page.if_persistent_contact_service: If the error persists, you can go to Altinn's help page or contact support at 75 00 60 00
error_page.user_connection_error: Huh, looks like there's nothing here.
error_page.acting_party_data_error: A technical error occurred. Please try again later. If the problem persists, contact Altinn support at 75 00 60 00.
error_page.unsynced_connection_title: Synchronization issue - our fault, not yours
error_page.unsynced_connection: We have a synchronization issue between the new and old solution. This is something we are working on, but for now, you unfortunately cannot see your accesses here. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause!
error_page.unsynced_connection_link: Click here to view your accesses in the old solution

api_delegation.api_delegations: Delegated accesses to application programming interface - API
api_delegation.api_delegations_received: Received accesses to application programming interface - API
api_delegation.you_have_delegated_accesses: You have earlier delegated these accesses:
api_delegation.api_panel_content: Here you can control access to APIs secured through
api_delegation.api_overview_text: Here you'll find an overview over the API-accesses your organisation has delegated to other organisations
api_delegation.api_received_overview_text: Here you'll find an overview over the API-accesses your organisation has been granted by other organisations
api_delegation.new_org_content_text: Select which users will have access by clicking the plus sign. You can also add a new organization by using the search field.
api_delegation.buisness_search_notfound_title: We can't find what you're looking for
api_delegation.buisness_search_notfound_content: Are you sure this is the right organization number? If you're unsure, you can search by name on the pages of
api_delegation.buisness_search_info_content: Search for the organization you wish to delegate to by inputting their complete 9 digit organization number
api_delegation.confirmation_page_content_top_text: You wish to give access to the following APIs
api_delegation.confirmation_page_content_second_text: The API-accesses will be given to:
api_delegation.confirmation_page_content_bottom_text: The accesses will be given and is valid until they're actively deleted.
api_delegation.new_api_content_text2: Select which APIs you want to grant access to by clicking the plus sign. You can also search for APIs by name and filter by provider.
api_delegation.no_chosen_orgs: You have no selected organizations to provide API access to. Please click the previous button at the bottom right.
api_delegation.data_retrieval_failed: Something crashed, try refreshing the page.
api_delegation.orgs_not_chosen_subtitle: Couldn't retrieve chosen organisations. Please go to previous page to choose organisations by clicking previous button on the bottom to the right.
api_delegation.delegations_not_registered: Your choices were not registered. Please restart the delegation process.
api_delegation.failed_delegations: These API delegations went wrong and were therefore not assigned
api_delegation.no_offered_api_delegations: Your organisation hasn't delegated any APIs
api_delegation.no_received_delegations: Your organisation hasn't received any API delegations
api_delegation.receipt_page_failed_text: Please try again later and contact Altinn Service desk if the error persists.
api_delegation.receipt_page_bottom_text: Access is granted and valid until it is actively deleted or withdrawn.
api_delegation.own_orgnumber_delegation_heading: You can't delegate to your own organisation number
api_delegation.own_orgnumber_delegation_paragraph: Search for another organisation number to continue.
api_delegation.insufficient_authentication_level: You don't have secure enough login to delegate the service. Please log in with one of the methods below:

single_rights.missing_role_access: {{you}} don't have the required rights to perform this delegation. CEO or main administrator can help you with this.
single_rights.missing_delegation_access: {{you}} don't have the necessary delegation accesses to perform this delegation. CEO or main administrator can help you with this.
single_rights.missing_srr_right_access: Who gets to use this service is determined by {{serviceowner}}, and {{reporteeorg}} is not given that opportunity. We recommend that you contact {{serviceowner}}
single_rights.new_error: This is a new error that we haven't gotten before. Please report it to Altinn by sending in a screen shot.
single_rights.generic_error_try_again_title: Whoops, we stumbled on a technical error
single_rights.generic_error_try_again: Try adding the service again by clicking on the plus sign again. Contact Altinn support if the problem persists.
single_rights.unauthorized_for_party: You cannot delegate services for the selected actor. If you meant to delegate on behalf of someone else, please go to the profile and select this actor from the list of delegators.
single_rights.rights_are_valid_until_deletion: The rights are valid until they're deleted or withdrawn
single_rights.confirm_delegation_text: Confirm that you want to give these rights to {{name}}
single_rights.delegate_choose_service_page_top_text: On this page, you can give {{name}} access to forms and services by choosing them from the list below. We recommend that you filter the services based on relevant owners or search for a specific service by name.
single_rights.request_choose_service_page_top_text: On this page you, as {{name}}, can request access to forms and services by choosing them from the list below. We recommend that you filter the services based on relevant owners or search for a specific service by name.
single_rights.choose_rights_page_secondary_text: If you want to adjust the accesses e.g. Remove write access, click the arrow to open the service to adjust this.
single_rights.alert_partially_delegable_header: You don't have access to delegate the whole service
single_rights.woops_something_went_wrong_ingress: Woops, something  wen wrong with one or more services. These are marked in red. You can try again later.
single_rights.all_failed_techncal_problem_paragraph: A technical problem has arised delegating this service. We recommend that you start a new delegation and try one more time. If the problem persists we ask you to contact user service on phone number 75 00 60 00. We're sorry!
single_rights.some_failed_technical_problem: Because of a technical error all rights weren't delegated. We recommend that you retry delegating the service by going to the delegation page.
single_rights.action_bar_adjust_rights_text: If you want to limit the delegable accesses you can click the buttons below to remove them.
single_rights.cancel_popover_text: Chosen services won't be delegated. Are you sure you want to cancel?
single_rights.cannot_delegate_alert_heading: You cannot give power of attorney to this service
single_rights.ceo_or_main_admin_can_help: CEO or main administrator can help you with this.
single_rights.one_or_more_rights_is_undelegable: One or more rights on this service cant be delegated because: {{reason}}
single_rights.missing_recipient_error_message: The recipient for the delegation is missing. Please go back to the profile page and select who you wish to delegate to.
single_rights.faulty_recipient_error_message: The given recipient cannot be delegated to. Please go back to the profile page and select another. The recipient must be an organization, a business user, or a person registered with a birth number. Self-registered users cannot be delegated to.
single_rights.restart_prompter_no_resources_chosen_ing: We cannot see that any services have been selected.
single_rights.give_new_single_right: Give power of attorney to new service
single_rights.wip_message: We are still working on this page! To manage services, please go to the old solution.

access_packages.helptext_content: Access packages are a collection of forms and services that deal with the same topic. These will replace Altinn roles and will be filled with more services over time.
access_packages.other_packages_in_area_title: Other available packages in this area:
access_packages.package_delegation_success: {{name}} has been successfully granted power of attorney over {{accessPackage}}.
access_packages.package_delegation_error: Failed to grant power of attorney over {{accessPackage}} to {{name}}.
access_packages.package_deletion_success: Power of attorney over {{accessPackage}} has been successfully revoked for {{name}}.
access_packages.package_deletion_error: Failed to revoke {{name}}'s power of attorney over {{accessPackage}}.
access_packages.user_has_no_packages: This user has no access packages.
access_packages.info_alert_text: Access packages will replace today's Altinn roles. They will be filled with more services over time. Read more on the help pages.
access_packages.person_info_alert: Giving powers of attorney to individuals is currently not supported. This will come later.

delegation_check.delegation_check_error_message_singular: A technical error prevents you from giving the user the access package. Please contact Altinn user service if the problem persists.
delegation_check.delegation_check_error_message_plural: A technical error prevents you from giving the user one or more access packages. Please contact Altinn user service if the problem persists.

role.fetch_error_heading: Unable to show roles for this user
role.fetch_error_description: We can't fetch the roles right now.
role.resources_disclaimer: This role might still grant access to services that only exist in the old solution.
role.resources_disclaimer_link: See the list of services in the old solution

access_status.via_role: {{user_name}} has access to this through the role they hold in {{via_name}}.
access_status.via_keyrole: {{user_name}} has access to this through their role in {{via_name}}.
access_status.via_priv: {{user_name}} has access to this through their role as a private individual.

user_roles.has_client_access_description: This user has access to one or more of the organization's clients. This does not necessarily mean they have access to the organization's own content, but that they can perform work on behalf of one or more of their clients/customers. Which clients they have access to can be managed under client administration.
user_roles.has_client_access_description_self: You have access to one or more of the organization's clients. This does not necessarily mean you have access to the organization's own content, but you can perform work on behalf of one or more of their clients/customers. Which clients they have access to can be managed under your clients.

users_page.main_page_heading: Users with power of attorney in {{name}}
users_page.user_list_heading: Other users with power of attorney
users_page.only_you_have_access: Only you have access here. Do you want to change this?
users_page.user_no_search_result_with_add_suggestio: No matches for the search "{{searchTerm}}". Is this someone you want to give access to?
users_page.no_access_to_users_header: We are still working on this page!
users_page.no_access_to_users_message:
Only access managers can see the full list of users with powers of attorney in this organization.
A list of key personnel (the board) will eventually be made available to users without access management.

advanced_user_search.user_no_filter_result_with_add_suggestio: No users match the selected filters. Is this someone you want to give access to?

reportees_page.not_admin_alert: You do not have access to this page for {{name}}. Please switch to a different page or change to a reportee you have sufficient rights for.

my_clients_page.main_page_heading: Clients you have access to through {{name}}
my_clients_page.not_acting_on_behalf_info: This page is only available when you are acting on behalf of another party.
my_clients_page.remove_package_success_snackbar: {{name}} no longer has client access for {{accessPackage}}.
my_clients_page.remove_package_error: Could not remove {{name}}'s client access for {{accessPackage}}.
my_clients_page.delete_provider_heading: You are deleting all client access for this party
my_clients_page.delete_provider_body: All client access through {{name}} will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.

user_rights_page.delete_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete this?

delete_user.user_heading: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
delete_user.user_message: {{to_name}} will lose all authorizations for {{from_name}} and will no longer have access to their content or be able to represent them in Altinn. This action cannot be undone.
delete_user.user_limited_deletion_heading: The user has access that cannot be deleted
delete_user.user_limited_deletion_message:
{{to_name}} has authorizations through role(s) in the Central Coordinating Register for Legal Entities or in the old Altinn solution, and therefore cannot be completely deleted from {{from_name}}.

Do you want to delete all access that is not linked to such roles? This action cannot be undone.
delete_user.user_deletion_not_allowed_message: {{to_name}} only has authorizations through role(s) in the Central Coordinating Register for Legal Entities or in the old Altinn solution, and therefore cannot be deleted here.
delete_user.yourself_heading: Are you sure you want to delete all your access?
delete_user.yourself_message: You will lose all authorizations you have for {{from_name}} and will no longer have access to their content or be able to represent them in Altinn. This action cannot be undone.
delete_user.yourself_limited_deletion_heading: You have access that cannot be deleted
delete_user.yourself_limited_deletion_message:
You have authorizations through role(s) in the Central Coordinating Register for Legal Entities or in the old Altinn solution, and therefore cannot be completely deleted from {{from_name}}.

Do you want to delete all access that is not linked to such roles? This action cannot be undone.
delete_user.yourself_deletion_not_allowed_message: You only have authorizations through role(s) in the Central Coordinating Register for Legal Entities or in the old Altinn solution, and therefore cannot be deleted here.
delete_user.reportee_heading: Are you sure you want to delete all their access?
delete_user.reportee_message: {{to_name}} will lose all authorizations for {{from_name}} and will no longer have access to their content or be able to represent them in Altinn. This action cannot be undone.
delete_user.reportee_limited_deletion_heading: They have access that cannot be deleted
delete_user.reportee_limited_deletion_message:
{{to_name}} has authorizations through role(s) in the Central Coordinating Register for Legal Entities or in the old Altinn solution, and therefore cannot be completely deleted from {{from_name}}.

Do you want to delete all access that is not linked to such roles? This action cannot be undone.
delete_user.reportee_deletion_not_allowed_message: {{to_name}} only has authorizations through role(s) in the Central Coordinating Register for Legal Entities or in the old Altinn solution, and therefore cannot be deleted here.

delegation_modal.give_service_to_name: Give {{name}} power of attorney for new service
delegation_modal.give_package_to_name: Give {{name}} power of attorney for new access package

delegation_modal.error_message: Failed to give power of attorney to {{name}}

delegation_modal.inherited_role_org_message: {{user_name}} has access to this through their role in {{org_name}}. Therefore, it cannot be deleted.

actions.action_description: These are the technical actions that the service offers. You can grant power of attorney to the entire service or choose specific actions.

specific_rights.missing_role_message: You cannot delegate the entire service because you lack some of the rights yourself.
specific_rights.missing_srr_right_message: {{reportee}} is not given permission from {{resourceOwner}} to delegate the whole service. Contact them if you want to change this.

technical_error_message.heading: Oops! Something went wrong.
technical_error_message.message: We encountered a technical issue. If the problem continues, please contact Altinn user service.
technical_error_message.all_failed: No new rights were granted to {{name}}

general_error.revoke_heading: Could not delete power of attorney
general_error.delegate_heading: Could not give power of attorney

validation_error.AM.VLD-00002: You do not have permission to grant this authorization.
validation_error.AM.VLD-00028: This access package cannot be given to {{entity_type}}.
validation_error.default: Could not grant power of attorney

partial_deletion_message.heading: Do you want to delete the access not linked to the Central Coordinating Register for Legal Entities?
partial_deletion_message.body:
{{ to_name }} has been granted this authorization both directly and through their roles in the Central Coordinating Register for Legal Entities.

Even if you delete this directly granted authorization, the user will still have the authorization through the Central Coordinating Register for Legal Entities.

service_error.general_heading: You cannot give access to this service
service_error.undelegable_service: {{resourceOwner}} has determined that this service cannot be given to others.
service_error.technical_error: A technical error has occurred. Please try again or contact Altinn user service if the problem persists.
service_error.access_list_service: Who can use this service is determined by {{resourceOwner}}, and {{reportee}} has not been given that opportunity. We recommend contacting {{resourceOwner}}.
service_error.missing_rights: You cannot delegate this authorization to others because you do not have it yourself. The general manager or main administrator can help you with this.

access_status.via_role: {{user_name}} has access to this access package through the role they hold in {{via_name}}. This access package cannot be deleted.
access_status.via_connection: {{user_name}} has access to this access package through {{via_name}}. This access package cannot be deleted.
access_status.via_keyrole: {{user_name}} has this access package through their role in {{via_name}}. This access package cannot be deleted.
access_status.via_priv: {{user_name}} has this power of attorney through their role as a private individual. It cannot be deleted.

status_section.cannot_delegate_here: Access to this package cannot be granted here.
status_section.no_permissions_fulltext: Your organization might have content that no one sees. You must grant access to {{packageName}} for such messages and services to be visible.

new_user_modal.not_found_error_person: Did not find a user with the given name and national identity number or username. Please check that you entered the correct information.

new_user_modal.too_many_requests_error: You have been blocked due to too many failing attempts. Try again in an hour.
new_user_modal.trigger_button_large: Give power of attorney to new user
new_user_modal.limited_preview_message: Unfortunately, you cannot add people just yet. This feature will be available in the future.

new_user_modal.person_identifier_whitespace_forbidden_e: Spaces are not allowed in SSN or username
new_user_modal.last_name_format_error: Please enter a valid last name

settings_page.not_admin_alert: You do not have access to edit notification addresses for {{name}}. Switch actor or contact someone with administrator rights.
settings_page.manage_addresses_info: Altinn uses the address(es) to notify the organization about new content.
settings_page.error_saving_addresses: Something went wrong. Please try again.
settings_page.no_addresses_error: The organization must have at least one email address or SMS number for notifications.
settings_page.alert_settings_info: Notifications sent to registered notification addresses are sent regardless of whether the recipient has the right to view the content in Altinn. If you have a shared email address, it is natural to include it here. Read more

a2Alerts.launchAlertContent: This user may also have authorizations from the previous Altinn.
a2Alerts.launchAlertLinkText: View authorizations from the previous Altinn
a2Alerts.oldRolesContent: These Altinn roles may include services that already exist in the new Altinn solution. The services are being moved into the new access packages. The user has the same roles in the old solution, but there they include more and different services.
a2Alerts.legacyRoleContent: This role will soon be removed. Use access packages instead.

systemuser_overviewpage.sub_title_text: By creating a system access, you give a vendor system access to solve tasks in Altinn on behalf of your company.

systemuser_overviewpage.agent_delegation_systemusers_load_error: Failed to load system accesses for customers

systemuser_overviewpage.no_key_role1: You do not have sufficient rights.
systemuser_overviewpage.no_key_role2: To create a system access you need the role Access manager, Main administrator or General manager

client_administration_page.no_access_title: You do not have access to client administration
client_administration_page.forwarding_accesses_info: New! You can now forward accesses that your business has received from others. These can only be given to private individuals. Read more about this on the help pages.

systemuser_creationpage.content_text1: If you are unsure about which vendor system to choose, we recommend that you contact the provider of the vendor system. Altinn has not made any assessment of the quality and safety of the vendor systems in the list.

systemuser_delegation_errors.14_unable_to_do_delegation_check: Delegation of services failed with an unknown error.
systemuser_delegation_errors.16_delegation_right_missing_role_access: Delegation of services failed: your role does not have the rights to delegate services to system access.
systemuser_delegation_errors.18_delegation_right_missing_delegation_a: Delegation of services failed: you do not have the rights to directly delegate services.

landing_page.alert_heading: You are now in the new access management solution
